headline: v1.1.0-alpha release
description: This version encapsulates the BaaS upgrades and various miscellaneous fixes since v1.0.0-alpha.

headline: Savefile imports
description: The necessary work to pull savefiles from the BaaS login system has been completed. You can now import a savefile without needing to ask the server owner. See the "Importing a save" section below for more details.

headline: New login server
description: Courtesy of LukeFZ#4035, the server now calls into an external login service which means account linking is now possible! It will also be possible soon to import a save via this service without having to direct message anyone.

headline: v1.0.0-alpha release
description: This is the first public release of the server. Welcome everyone!
